captions.text:
- TOTALLY DIFFERENT LOOK
THIS TIME.

- YES, I CAME
A LITTLE BUTTONED UP.

- YEAH.
- YES.
- YEAH, LAST TIME YOU WERE HERE,

I HAPPENED TO HAVE A COHOST
THAT DAY, MATTHEW PERRY,

AND MATTHEW PERRY
COULD NOT HAVE BEEN HAPPIER
TO BE THE COHOST THAT DAY.

- [laughing]
YEAH.

- HE WAS REALLY, UH--I DIDN'T--
I DIDN'T QUITE KNOW
WHERE TO LOOK MYSELF.
THAT WAS, UM...
[laughter]
- I COULDN'T MOVE.

IT WAS JUST, LIKE, EVERYWHERE
I MOVED WAS LIKE...
WHOA-WHOA-WHOA.

- NO, THERE WAS NOTHING
COVERING ANYTHING.
IT WAS LIKE...

I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE POINT
OF THOSE THINGS WERE

THAT WERE UP THERE
THAT WERE JUST GUIDING THEM
IN A CERTAIN DIRECTION MAYBE.
I DON'T UNDERSTAND.

- I WAS ALREADY PREGNANT, AND
I COULDN'T TELL ANYBODY, RIGHT?

SO THE WARDROBE--YOU KNOW,
THEY PUT ME IN THIS DRESS,

AND I HAD TO JUST BE LIKE,
"OH, AWESOME.
THIS LOOKS GREAT."
AND THEY WERE, LIKE, UP HERE,

AND I CAME OUT
AND ALL I SAW WAS YOUR FACE,
AND YOU WERE LIKE, "HEY."
[laughter]

AND THEN HE WAS LIKE, "HI."
AND I'M LIKE, "HELLO."
[laughs]

- THAT GOT SO MUCH PICK-UP.
THAT GOT SO MUCH ATTENTION.

- I KNOW.
- YEAH.

- THEY GREW FIRST
IN THE PREGNANCY.

- I SEE.
THAT WAS THE FIRST THING.
SO HOW FAR ALONG WERE YOU THEN?

- I-I DON'T EVEN--
I WAS EARLY.

I WAS, LIKE, MAYBE SIX WEEKS,
SEVEN WEEKS.

- OKAY, SO NOW--AND NOW
YOU SINCE HAVE HAD HER,
AND HOW OLD IS SHE NOW?

- SHE'S FOUR MONTHS.
- FOUR MONTHS OLD.

PRECIOUS LITTLE--IS SHE GOOD?
IS SHE SLEEPING?

- SHE'S FANTASTIC.
SHE'S SLEEPING BETTER NOW.

NOT SO MUCH IN THE BEGINNING,
WHICH WAS A LITTLE ROUGH,
BUT SHE'S A GREAT SLEEPER NOW,

AND SHE WATCHES YOUR SHOW
EVERY DAY.

- OH, YEAH?
- YES.

WE BOTH GET VERY EXCITED
WHEN THE THEME SONG STARTS--

- WHAT IS HER NAME, BY THE WAY?
- AUTUMN.

- AUTUMN. BEAUTIFUL.
- YES, THANK YOU, THANKS.
AND SHE--SHE LOVES YOUR SHOW.
SHE LOVES PHARRELL AND DRAKE.

SHE'S BIG INTO HIP-HOP AND
LATIN MUSIC, FOR SOME REASON.

- WOW.
- YEAH, SHE LOVES IT.

SHE DOES THE DOUGIE.
YEAH.

- NOW I THINK YOU'RE LYING.
- [laughs]

I TAKE HER ARMS
AND DO THE DOUGIE.

- FOR A MINUTE I WAS LIKE, "WOW,
SHE LOVES ME."
BUT NOW IT'S ALL LIES.
[laughter]

- SHE DOES LOVE YOU.
- BUT DOES SHE DANCE?

DOES SHE RESPOND TO MUSIC?
- SHE DOES.

YEAH, THE SECOND
THE SHOW COMES ON

AND YOU START DANCING,
SHE LIKE--

SHE DOES THIS WEIRD KICK THING
WITH HER LEG
AND SHE GETS HER LITTLE CHAIR.
SHE LOVES IT.

I THINK SHE'S GONNA BE
A DANCER, I REALLY DO.
SHE LOVES IT, YEAH.

- AND YOU HAVE--SO MANY THINGS
HAVE CHANGED.

YOU'RE GETTING MARRIED?
YOU'RE MARRIED?

- I'M MARRIED.
- YOU GOT MARRIED.

- FIVE DAYS BEFORE SHE WAS BORN,
BASICALLY, YEAH.

- WOW.
- [laughs]
[cheers and applause]

- CONGRATULATIONS.
- THANK YOU, THANK YOU.

- IT MUST'VE BEEN
A SMALL WEDDING,
'CAUSE I WAS NOT INVITED.
- IT WAS JUST THE TWO OF US,

AND THEN WE WENT
TO BED, BATH, & BEYOND,

'CAUSE THAT'S
WHAT MARRIED PEOPLE DO.

- WOW.
- YEAH.

IT WAS REALLY SWEET, AND HE'S
AN AWESOME, INCREDIBLE FATHER

AND A GREAT HUSBAND,
AND I JUST FEEL REALLY LUCKY.

- OH, THAT'S GREAT.
- YEAH, IT'S AWESOME.

- I THINK THAT'S--
I'M SO HAPPY FOR YOU.
- OH, THERE HE IS.

- I'M HAPPY THAT YOU'RE HAPPY
IN YOUR LIFE.
- THANK YOU.

title: Jennifer Love Hewitt on Her New Baby and Husband
